item.title: Plot monthly means
item.description: There are three reasons to aggregate data monthly, rather than hourly, daily, or weekly. Alignment with corporate and government planning cycles: fiscal quarters are the standard unit of corporate or government time, and months divide them evenly. Policies are implemented, benchmarks are set, and targets evaluated in terms of months. In the areas where I work, aggregating data by month is valuable because it returns analysis results that line-up with the way our clients already think about time.
